dog/storm: Displays a random picture of our lord and savior ***Stormageddon***.
changeprefix INSERT-SYMBOL: **BOT ADMIN ONLY** command that changes the prefix the bot uses in your server. Available Symbols: ``~!$%^&*()_+-={}[]|\:";\'<>?,.`
createautorolemsg: **BOT ADMIN ONLY** command that has the bot create the reactions for auto role assignment.
play SEARCH-TEARM/YOUTUBE-LINK/YOUTUBE-P: Plays the selected music in the voice channel you are in, NOTE: Playlists have a maximum of 30 videos.
volume 1-100: Sets the bots volume in percent.
